EmailTemplate.name: CPS More Info Needed Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Need more Information on your ticket {!Case.CaseNumber} with Subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
Please provide the below details so that we can further investigate the issue: {!Case.Additional_Comments__c}
Please provide this information as quickly as possible.
If our team has not received a reply to this request within 30 days, the ticket will automatically close due to inadequate information. If you experience a new issue, please submit a new ticket via the “contact us” link from any of our websites where you are facing the issue.
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
